Text.Page:
The poporis need gear, but Velika has been slow to useless about sending any here. I guess we'll have to take matters into our own hands.

Chop down some {@LinkCreature:23#2#ironwood ghilliedhus} and collect their bark. That stuff makes decent shields.

I'll crank out some shields.

You've saved some lives today, . Hopefully, it'll earn you a transfer to a region with bigger problems than this.

Still, it's the little steps we take now that pay off big in the end.

I hope.

I know this isn't glamorous, but the poporis are our allies. We need to help them as best we can.

So, get back out there and bring back some bark.
